North_Richland_Hills.Mercantile Center station:
Mercantile Center is an under-construction TEXRail station in Fort Worth, Texas.


== History ==
The station was originally planned to be named "Beach Street/Mercantile" due to the adjacent street, but the name was changed to "Mercantile Center" in late 2016.


== Services ==


=== TEXRail ===
The Mercantile Center station will be an opening day station when the entire corridor is finished in 2018.
